decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title numbers:

REASON: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing dwelling house, and shall be consistent with those as listed within the submitted application form and the drawings / plans as listed in Condition (2).

REASON: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the existing building and surrounding area, in accordance with policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan 2013, policies 1.1 (g) and 1.2 (f) of the adopted Local Development Framework (Core Strategy 2012) and policies 7.4, 7.6 of the London Plan (2016). | The skylights hereby approved shall not protrude more than 150 millimetres beyond the plane of the original roof when measured from the perpendicular with the external surface of the original roof.

REASON: To ensure that the development harmonises with the surroundings and the host building, in accordance with policies 7.4 and 7B of the Adopted Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), policies 1.1, 1.2 (f) of the Adopted Core Strategy (2012) and policy 7.4 of the London Plan (2016). | No part of the roof of the extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

REASON: To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies 7.4 and 7.6 of The London Plan (2016), polices 7.4, 7A & 7B of the Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and polices 1.1 (e)(g), 1.2 (f), 2.1(c) and 2.10 Adopted Development (Core) Strategy 2012.
